ZappieHost has an Exclusive LEB Discount in New Zealand and South Africa! (1GB VPS for $5!)

new zealand, south africa, zappie host March 5, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Welcome back, Zappie Host!

They haven’t been seen around these parts since 2016.  They’re offering service in a couple bona fide exotic locations: New Zealand and South Africa.  We don’t see many offerings for those locales so it’s exciting to see a host providing service off the beaten path.

Adam from Zappie Host commented: “South Africa and New Zealand are pretty rare and exotic hosting locations. and even more so with affordable Low End prices. We have been around catering for these two regions for the past 6 years with a growing infrastructure which we are very proud of to be able to deliver solid services at affordable prices.”

Zappie Host has a special promo code for us, so you’re getting half off their normal rates.  Paying $5 for a 1GB VPS is pretty typical pricing but to see it in New Zealand or South Africa is awesome!  And yes, that promo code is recurring!

Here’s a bit more from Adam about Zappie Host:

“Zappie Host LLC was founded in March 2015 (6 years ago) with the mission statement, Taking Hosting Seriously.  Zappie Host offers low cost, business grade SSD Cloud VPS, Dedicated servers and Colocation Services in Auckland, New Zealand and Johannesburg, South Africa.

For more information about our network and hosting solutions feel free to have look at our New Zealand Hosting Network and our South Africa Hosting Network information pages

Its been a very very long time since we last posted an offer (over 4 years to be exact), but we figured, its 2021 and its time to do another crazy 50% off (for life) promotion on our services… So here goes!

An LET exclusive promotion applicable to all our South Africa LXC VPS and New Zealand LXC VPS line up. Starting at $3.25/mo this is a crazy cheap price for these exotic hosting locations!”

Right on!  Their WHOIS is public. They are registered in New Zealand (6248800). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept BitCoin, PayPal, Credit Cards.

If you decide to give Zappie Host a try, please tell others how it goes in the comments below.

Now read more to see the offers!
